description: RUSTY STEVENS - SOLOAt 6' and 195 pounds of worked out muscle, Rusty is very fond of being a rugged kind of man.  He loves riding fast motorcycles and when he's done he loves nothing more than getting naked and taking matters into his own hands.  After a nice ride earlier in the day, Rusty has brought his bike into the garage where he cannot control himself and his need to bust a nut.  He slowly gets undressed as he caresses all the muscles on his hairy body paying special attention to the once muscle that needs to be stroked the most.  Once naked, he makes himself comfortable on the bike and shoots an ample load all over his fuel tank.
title: Crotch Rocket
